title: Wild rice and cucumber salad
ingredients: ['200g mixed rice (wild rice and brown rice)', '600ml water', '2 cucumbers', '75g plain yoghurt', '4 tablespoons olive oil', '100ml lemon juice', '1 dash white wine vinegar', 'salt and pepper, to taste', '1 bunch fresh coriander, finely chopped', '1 bunch spring onions, chopped']
